ctl:form.h1: Compliance Test Suite for the OGC Web Coverage Service (WCS) 2.0 Core
ctl:form.p: This validation service checks a server implementation for conformance to the Web Coverage Service (WCS) 2.0 specification.
Complete information about the test suite and requirements for the server implementation can be found here.
Enter a URL of a WCS 2.0 Service endpoint. The URL should be specified without any query parameters.
